recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.author: Maria
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 220°C, Roll out the pizza dough into a thin crust, Spread tomato sauce on the dough, Add slices of mozzarella on top, Sprinkle with fresh basil leaves, Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt, Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown

recipes.name: Pizza Carbonara
recipes.author: Giovanni
recipes.description: A twist on the classic Italian pasta dish!
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 220°C, Roll out the pizza dough into a thin crust, Cook the pancetta in a pan until crispy, In a bowl, beat the eggs and mix in the pecorino cheese and black pepper, Spread the egg and cheese mixture on the pizza dough, Sprinkle the cooked pancetta on top, Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown

recipes.name: Tacos al Pastor
recipes.author: Carlos
recipes.description: A flavorful and traditional Mexican dish!
recipes.instructions: Slice the pork shoulder into thin strips. In a blender, blend the pineapple, onion, garlic, achiote paste, cumin, and oregano to make a marinade, Marinate the pork in the marinade for at least 2 hours or overnight, Heat a pan and cook the marinated pork until cooked through, Warm the corn tortillas on a griddle, Fill the tortillas with the cooked pork, garnish with cilantro, and squeeze lime juice on top, Serve with salsa and enjoy!

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.author: Giulia
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with a creamy sauce.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. In a pan, cook the guanciale or pancetta until crispy. In a bowl, whisk together the egg yolks, grated Pecorino Romano cheese, black pepper, and a pinch of salt. Drain the cooked spaghetti and immediately add it to the pan with the cooked guanciale or pancetta, tossing to combine. Remove the pan from the heat and quickly pour in the egg mixture, stirring vigorously to coat the pasta and create a creamy sauce. Serve immediately with an additional sprinkle of grated Pecorino Romano cheese and black pepper on top.
